product_name: ERGObaby Original Collection Baby Carrier - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The award-winning and well-padded Ergobaby Original Collection Baby Carrier holds your baby in an ergonomic, natural sitting position on your front, back or hip. Get out with baby and explore! 100% cotton shell and lining. Baby is cradled in a natural sitting position and can be carried on the front, back or hip. Padded waist belt ensures baby's weight is evenly distributed between your hips and shoulders. Adjustable, cushy padded shoulder straps. Large zippered storage pocket for supplies. Hood is rated UPF 50+ and has its own storage pocket. Designed for babies weighing 7 lbs* - 45 lbs. (*Newborns require the Infant Insert, not included). Reinforced stitching for extra durability. Shoulder-strap length range: 24 in. - 44 in. Waistbelt circumference range: 26 in. - 55 in. Ergobaby Original Collection Baby Carrier is machine washable and designed in the USA. Closeout.
short_description: The award-winning and well-padded Ergobaby Original Collection Baby Carrier holds your baby in an ergonomic, natural sitting position on your front, back or hip. Get out with baby and explore!
